body_html:
I don't know how the summary function in keras work, so I can't comment on that without first having a look at it. Also, I'm curious how the summary function in keras handle cases where pure tensorflow code is mixed with keras code, is that possible? Because that's the current normal setup in PyTorch. That's the first thing I'd look into.

About the PR comment/history, it's fine, don't worry about it.

body:
I don't know how the `summary` function in keras work, so I can't comment on that without first having a look at it. Also, I'm curious how the `summary` function in keras handle cases where pure tensorflow code is mixed with keras code, is that possible? Because that's the current normal setup in PyTorch. That's the first thing I'd look into.

About the PR comment/history, it's fine, don't worry about it.
